channel.title: AARscape remove item turn into mining cart? FIXING HELP?
channel.description:
Looking to get a bit of help for my server, I'm trying to figure out why every time i remove an item i somehow get a mining cart underneath my character? If i take all my items off you just see the mining cart, I can equip a cape or something and it'll be floating.
Any ideas?

item.title: AARscape remove item turn into mining cart? FIXING HELP?
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

then idk the only time i know that there is minecarts is iff your using a hack client

Read full topic
